alternate_methods:
##Book by phone

You can book your practical driving test by phone by calling the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

$C

**DSA practical test bookings**

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1144  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

##Book by post

To book your practical test by post, download the application form and send with the correct fee to the DSA.

You can pay by cheque or postal order - make your cheque or postal order payable to the ‘Driving Standards Agency’. You can’t pay by cash.

$D [Download ‘Postal application for a practical driving test appointment’ form (PDF, 336KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_202263.pdf "Download ‘Postal application for a practical driving test appointment’ form (PDF, 336KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

$A

DSA
PO Box 280
Newcastle-upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP 

$A

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair Processing Notice for the DSA](/dsa-practical-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - Fair processing notice for the DSA") before you start your booking.

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
*[LGV]: Large goods vehicle
*[PCV]: Passenger carrying vehicle
alternative_title: Book your official Driving Standards Agency (DSA) practical driving test
introduction: Book your official practical driving test - you'll need to have passed your theory test. You can book online between 6am and 11:40pm.
more_information:
You’ll need your:

- Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
- theory test pass certificate number and date you passed (if needed)

You can [find your theory test pass certificate number](/find-your-lost-theory-test-pass-certificate-number "Find your lost theory test pass certificate number") online if you've lost your original letter.

If you're taking a car test and have your driving instructor's personal reference number you can use this to check they're available, but can book your test without doing this.
overview: Book your practical driving test from £62 using the only official driving test booking service
title: Book your practical driving test
